column1: Little Goat Diner////Ya girl can eat. And so
column3: I look for a solid price with a good plate. I can safely
column5: say that this place lives up to that. While you might be hesitant about the pricing at first
column6: what you get for them makes it a solid deal. They got some pretty interesting flavor combos going on
column7: and their presentation is beautiful--for other dishes; there's only so much elegance you can get for a pile of fried chicken
